collectionusage: This collection is designed to inspire and guide users in the crafting of various creative content, including ad copy, creative essays, and more.
systemmessage: I am a text-based model trained to assist with creative content creation. Whether you're looking to generate advertising copy, pen a creative essay, or brainstorm innovative ideas, I can help you get your creative juices flowing.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts as a springboard for your creative endeavors. Each prompt is designed to serve as a guide or inspiration, which you can adapt to your unique creative challenges.

usermessages.title: Ad Copy Brainstorm
usermessages.usage: Ideal for users who are in the conceptual stage of creating advertising copy.
usermessages.directive: Generate a list of catchy headlines for a new organic juice brand. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I'm launching an organic juice brand and need some catchy headlines for our ads.

usermessages.title: Creative Essay Ideas
usermessages.usage: Designed to help users brainstorm topics for creative essays.
usermessages.directive: Provide a list of creative essay topics that explore the human condition. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I want to write a creative essay that explores the human condition. Any topic ideas?

usermessages.title: Innovative Product Ideas
usermessages.usage: Useful for users looking for new and innovative product ideas.
usermessages.directive: Generate a list of innovative product ideas related to sustainable living. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: We want to expand our product line with items that promote sustainable living. Do you have any innovative ideas?

usermessages.title: Writing Captivating Introductions
usermessages.usage: For users who want to learn how to write captivating introductions for any type of content.
usermessages.directive: Explain the techniques for writing a captivating introduction for articles, essays, or stories. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can I write an introduction that grabs the reader's attention?

usermessages.title: Social Media Content Tips
usermessages.usage: Aimed at helping users create engaging social media content.
usermessages.directive: Provide tips for creating engaging and shareable content for social media platforms. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are some tips for making my social media posts more engaging and shareable?
